thread.title: Emaar, Orient agree on Dh1.22b The Address Hotel fire claim
thread.title_full: Emaar, Orient agree on Dh1.22b The Address Hotel fire claim | GulfNews.com

author: Staff Report
title: Emaar, Orient agree on Dh1.22b The Address Hotel fire claim
text:
DUBAI: Emaar and Orient Insurance have agreed on a Dh1.22 billion claim for the fire at the Address Downtown Dubai on New Yearâ€™s Eve 2015.
The fire at the 63-storey tower resulted in the closure of the flagship hotel; Dubai-listed Emaar said in December it hopes to reopen the hotel in mid-2017.
In a statement to the Dubai Financial Market on Monday February 6, Emaar said it had agreed to the Dh1.22 billion claim with Orient Insurance, which would result in write-back of the Dh301 million provision for the incident in 2015.
It said it would record the agreed sum as income for the quarter ending December 31, 2016.
